name: Carl Forberg
introduction: Carl Forberg (born 4 March 1911 and died 17 January 2000) was an American racing driver who participated in three Indianapolis 500 races between 1950 and 1952. At this time, results from the race were included in the Formula One championship, although Forberg scored no championship points. He qualified for a single event, finishing in 7th position at the 1951 Indianapolis 500.
